name: guide_lwc_accessibility
description: Provides accessibility guidelines for LWC components. When hasImages=true, includes Vision AI accessibility guidelines. Use this tool for both code-based accessibility guidance and visual accessibility validation.

mode.description: The mode of the MCP tool. "Fix" means the tool will fix the issues found in the code. "Score" means the tool will score the code.

hasImages.description: Whether images are present for Vision AI accessibility analysis. When true, includes Vision AI guidelines.
